pullRequest.title: Remove JSSContextSpi for the time being
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Alexander Scheel <ascheel@redhat.com>

Too many people are utilizing JSS master branch and expecting it to be stable. Remove JSSContextSpi for the time being until SSLEngine performance has been improved and SSLSocket is present.

nodes.bodyText: LGTM, but could we put the /* and */ in separate lines so they don't disturb the code?

beforeCommit.message:
Remove JSSContextSpi for the time being

Signed-off-by: Alexander Scheel <ascheel@redhat.com>

afterCommit.message:
Gate JSSContextSpi behind SSLEngine feature flag

Signed-off-by: Alexander Scheel <ascheel@redhat.com>

nodes.bodyText: The SSLEngine looks like a class name instead of variable name. I'd probably use something like USE_SSL_ENGINE. Regardless, this is just preference. The code looks good, feel free to merge.
